item.description:
Bonjour!
It is time to get outside and enjoy the Spring air. Meet others from other Language Meetup groups.
You are invited to come on a nice walk in Cheshire along the lovely rail trail.It is flat and easy. This will be combined with the French and German groups from West Hartford and Southern Connecticut.
For those who would enjoy ice cream, there is a glacerie across the road. Delicieux!
Some of you have asked-
WE WILL MEET IN THE PARKING AREA NEXT TO THE TRAIL ON NORTH BROOKSVALE ROAD (ROUTE 42). ROUTE 42 IS A MAJOR INTERSECTION WITH ROUTE 10. THIS WILL BE RELAXED AND NOT A RACE!! POURING RAIN CANCELS. GRAY SKIES DO NOT.
Day of: 860-573-3501 is my cell phone

Let's hope that it doesn't rain!
Here is a link to information on the historic park

http://www.ct.gov/dot...

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: Promenez avec nous!- a languages walk
